```{r setup, include=FALSE}
set.seed(1)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("hyper2")
library("disordR")
```


`https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Athletics_at_the_2020_Summer_Olympics_%E2%80%93_Men%27s_javelin_throw&oldid=1051014985`


```{r}
a <- read.table("javelin.txt",header=TRUE)
a
a <- t(a)
a
o <- NULL
for(i in seq_len(ncol(a))){
  jj <- as.numeric(a[,i])
  names(jj) <- rep(colnames(a)[i],length(jj))
  o <- c(o,jj)
}
o <-sort(o,na.last=TRUE,decreasing=TRUE)
o
names(o)
plot(o)
```

Now process it:

```{r,label=dothething1,cache=TRUE}    	   
H1 <- ordervec2supp3(v=names(o)[!is.na(o)],nonfinishers=names(o)[ is.na(o)])
m1 <- maxp(H1)
m1
```


```{r,label=dothething2,cache=TRUE}    	   
H2 <- ordervec2supp3(v=names(o)[!is.na(o)])
m2 <- maxp(H2)
m2
```

```{r,plotm}
pie(m1)
pie(m2)
dotchart(m1,pch=16)
dotchart(m2,pch=16)
par(pty="s")
plot(m1,m2,pch=16,type="p",asp=1)
abline(0,1)
```
